title: EXMON
author: EXMON
created_time: December 06, 2022, 09:54:15 AMLast edit: September 27, 2024, 05:15:47 AM by EXMON
content: Kami ay nasisiyahan na ipakilala sa iyo ang EXMON, isang cryptocurrency exchange na magbibigay sa iyo ng pinakamataas na kalayaan at pagiging kompidensyal sa pangangalakal!Kung pagod ka na sa mahigpit na mga proseso ng KYC at pagkaka-block ng mga pondo, ang aming proyekto ay para sa iyo.Site: Exmon.pro | EN topic | IN topic | RU topic | PH topic | ID topic | ES topic | PL topic | HR topic | DE topic | FR topic | TR topicAno ang aming inaalok?*** Walang kinakailangang KYC ***Kalimutang ang kumplikadong pagsuri at pangongolekta ng personal na impormasyon. Iginagalang namin ang iyong karapatan sa pagiging kompidensyal at hindi kinakailangan ang pagpapatunay ng pagkakakilanlan kung hindi ito nauugnay sa paglabag sa mga patakaran ng platform.*** Spot at P2P Trading ***Makakahanap ka ng lahat ng sikat na cryptocurrency at token, pati na rin ang posibilidad ng palitan sa pamamagitan ng P2P platform na may iba't ibang mga fiat na paraan ng pagbabayad.*** Mga Fiat na Currency at Payment Gateways ***Mahigit sa 300 payment gateways at higit sa 100 fiat currencies.*** Minimum na mga Kailangan ***Mag-trade na may minimum na deposito. Sa EXMON, maaari kang magsimulang mag-trade sa halagang $1 lamang.*** Libre at Agarang Internal na Paglipat ***Maglipat ng anumang mga currency at cryptocurrency sa pagitan ng mga gumagamit nang walang bayad at pagkaantala. Ang iyong mga transaksyon ay hindi lumalabas sa blockchain, pinapanatili ang ganap na pagiging kompidensyal.*** Token Listing *** Gusto mo bang ang iyong token o coin ay makalista sa EXMON? Kami ay bukas sa mga bagong alok. Mag-apply para sa listing at palawakin ang iyong audience!*** Mga Bonus at Referral System ***Kumuha ng $50 sa EXMON coins sa pagrehistro! Sumali sa aming referral program, makakuha ng mga bonus, at lumahok sa mga paligsahan na may mga premyo.Hindi namin pinapatunayan ang mga numero ng telepono.Maaari kang maglagay ng iyong aktwal na numero o anumang mga numero.Bakit EXMON?Ang aming misyon ay lumikha ng isang ligtas at maginhawang platform na sumusuporta sa mga prinsipyo ng pagiging kompidensyal at kalayaan na nasa puso ng cryptocurrency movement.Opisyal na Website: EXMON.proKami ay bukas: 24/7 Suporta:Telegram: @exmon_officialEmail: support@exmon.proForm sa websiteTicket system sa personal na accountPresensya sa Social MediaFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/pg/exmonproTwitter: https://twitter.com/exmon_officialVK: https://vk.com/exmon_officialLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/exmonTelegram: https://t.me/exmonproInaanyayahan ka naming sumali sa EXMON at samantalahin ang lahat ng mga benepisyo ng aming platform.Paggalang,Ang EXMON Team

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: EXMON on December 06, 2022, 09:54:15 AM- We have added a new service - Exmon Earn.Exmon Earn is a service where users earn money by helping others.Since you're asking for our phone numbers on the registration page and I don't have access to a disposable number, would you mind providing a bit more details regarding your new service?- Even your "blog post" doesn't have enough details!Quote from: EXMON on December 06, 2022, 09:54:15 AMTo activate your Exmon Earn account, go to dashboard, select "Earn" -> "Exmon Earn" from the menu and click the "Get code" button if you do not have your code.Am I correct in assuming that it's just a referral code that once someone registers with it, they'd be getting a discount of some sort and we'd be receiving a small percentage of their fees?

comments.author: EXMON
comments.created_time: December 09, 2022, 08:36:32 AMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 09:41:55 AM by EXMON
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on December 06, 2022, 07:16:26 PMQuote from: EXMON on December 06, 2022, 09:54:15 AM- We have added a new service - Exmon Earn.Exmon Earn is a service where users earn money by helping others.Since you're asking for our phone numbers on the registration page and I don't have access to a disposable number, would you mind providing a bit more details regarding your new service?- Even your "blog post" doesn't have enough details!Quote from: EXMON on December 06, 2022, 09:54:15 AMTo activate your Exmon Earn account, go to dashboard, select "Earn" -> "Exmon Earn" from the menu and click the "Get code" button if you do not have your code.Am I correct in assuming that it's just a referral code that once someone registers with it, they'd be getting a discount of some sort and we'd be receiving a small percentage of their fees?We do not check phone numbers. You can enter any numbers or you can enter a valid numberWe have a referral program, but we also have Exmon Earn. This is different. About Exmon EarnTerms of ServiceCard Types: There are four types of cards available, each with a different value: 1 USDT, 10 USDT, 50 USDT, and 100 USDT.Unique Codes: Each card is assigned a unique code. To gain access to a card, you must pay the cost of the card to the owner of the code by which you are activating it.Earning Potential: Once you have access to a card, you will receive the value of the card from each user who registers using your code. For example, if you have access to a 1 USDT card, you will receive 1 USDT from each registered user. If 100 users register using your code, you will receive 100 USDT. If you have access to a 100 USDT card, each registered user will bring you 100 USDT. In this case, 100 registered users would earn you 10,000 USDT.Sharing Your Code: It is important to share your card code as widely as possible to maximize your earning potential.Earning Amount: The amount you earn from each registered user will be equal to the value of the card you have access to.If you have any questions, write

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Do you support local currency PHP in your website? And how can we check the list of accepted payment method specifically for user residing in Philippines? Can you provide the list here so that we can view without registering the account to see the overview of exchange.I want to clarify the earn feature, Is the money that I will received let’s say for 50USDT card will came from the user that I invite balance? It’s very hard to understand the mechanics because it looks like a typical referral program but there’s a payment involved that confused me.

comments.author: EXMON
comments.body: Quote from: AbuBhakar on December 31, 2022, 05:34:10 PMDo you support local currency PHP in your website? And how can we check the list of accepted payment method specifically for user residing in Philippines? Can you provide the list here so that we can view without registering the account to see the overview of exchange.I want to clarify the earn feature, Is the money that I will received let’s say for 50USDT card will came from the user that I invite balance? It’s very hard to understand the mechanics because it looks like a typical referral program but there’s a payment involved that confused me.Available cryptocurrencies:BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC, BNB, BUSD, DOGE, MATIC, DAI, LTC, LINK, XMR, ETC, BCH, ZEC, DASH, DGBFor the Philippines, available payments:Cash in PersonBank TransferCIMB PhilippinesSEA BankUnionBank of the PhilippinesAsia United BankGcashPaymayaBank of the Philippine Islands (BPI)Coins.phBanco De Oro (BDO)Metropolitan Bank of the PhilippinesRizal Commercial Banking CorporationLandbank of the PhilippinesPhilippines National Bank (PNB)ShopeePay-SEAMaybankAlipayAbout the earning function.This feature is a bit similar to the referral program, but it is different.In the referral program, you get a percentage of the deposit or transaction volume. This is where you get all the money a user sends you.This is a kind of mutual aid fund. The platform does not earn anything from this feature.What is it for? For the user, this is an opportunity to earn.Example.The user posts a video on his channel or in his social networks, in which he says "Hey guys, there is a great opportunity to earn. You only need (here $1, $10, $50, $100) and you can earn many times more.With the first active user, the invested amount is returned, and then your profit. Here is the code (your code) Register and earn."Anyone who is interested will register with your code and send you the translation.

comments.body: Hey everyone! We appreciate all of your interest and support, and we want to take this opportunity to ask for your help.As we continue to develop and grow our exchange, we want to make sure that we're meeting the needs and expectations of our users. That's why we're reaching out to you - the members of this forum - to get your feedback and ideas on how we can improve.We would love to hear from you about what features you would like to see, what changes you think we should make, and any other suggestions you have for us. Your input will help us build a better exchange that truly meets the needs of our users.So, if you have any thoughts or ideas, please share them with us in this forum thread. We will be monitoring this thread closely and taking all of your feedback into consideration as we continue to improve our exchange.Thank you in advance for your help and support. We value your input and look forward to hearing from you!

comments.author: EXMON
comments.body: Get ready for the grand reopening of EXMON with an all-new arsenal of features!We're thrilled to announce that EXMON is back and better than ever! We've been working hard to enhance our platform with powerful features that will make your crypto trading experience even more seamless and rewarding.Dive into the enhanced EXMON experience:P2P Trading: Engage in secure and swift transactions directly with fellow users, bypassing intermediaries.Spot Trading: Execute instant trades of cryptocurrencies at the prevailing market price.Unwavering Commitment to User Privacy:At EXMON, we respect your right to anonymity. That's why our KYC (Know Your Customer) procedure remains voluntary. This means no more fund freezes, a common practice on other exchanges.Our Cornerstones:Anonymity, Reliability, and Security: These pillars form the foundation of our operations.Lightning-Fast Speed: Experience rapid transactions and low fees.Round-the-Clock Support: Our dedicated team is always available to assist you.Calling all crypto enthusiasts, traders, and investors!Join our vibrant community and explore the revamped EXMON exchange.Beta testing is now underway!Sign up to be a beta tester and share your valuable feedback and suggestions. We appreciate your input, and all beta testers will be handsomely rewarded!Stay tuned for updates and be ready for launch to grab exciting bonuses, rewards, and prizes!We look forward to welcoming you to the EXMON revolution!The EXMON Team

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: I have not explore your exchange yet, but I just like to ask how safe the "KYC FREE EXCHANGE" nowadays?I mean, the Philippine government is so strict when it comes to exchanges getting Filipinos to use the exchange, in fact the SEC had already issue a ban of exchanges in the Philippines, that includes Binance. So this one is obviously no license since it's KYC free, there's a huge risk that it will be ban in the Philippines eventually. Do you have a p2p in your platform too?

comments.author: EXMON
comments.body: Quote from: Japinat on May 25, 2024, 08:46:33 PMI have not explore your exchange yet, but I just like to ask how safe the "KYC FREE EXCHANGE" nowadays?I mean, the Philippine government is so strict when it comes to exchanges getting Filipinos to use the exchange, in fact the SEC had already issue a ban of exchanges in the Philippines, that includes Binance. So this one is obviously no license since it's KYC free, there's a huge risk that it will be ban in the Philippines eventually. Do you have a p2p in your platform too?One of the key elements of cryptocurrencies is anonymity. Satoshi Nakamoto envisioned Bitcoin as a tool to give people more freedom and control over their finances. Anonymity plays a key role in this, allowing people to make transactions without interference from third parties such as governments or financial institutions.However, governments around the world are increasingly passing laws that require cryptocurrency exchanges and users to go through KYC (Know Your Customer) procedures. These laws require users to provide personal information to the exchange, such as their name, address, and passport details.We believe that such laws are contrary to the fundamental principles of cryptocurrencies. KYC procedures undermine anonymity, making cryptocurrencies less attractive to many users.We believe in freedom and give people the right to decide for themselves whether or not they want to remain anonymous. We do not require users to go through KYC procedures, and we offer a wide range of features that allow them to maintain their privacy.Regarding your question about the security of KYC-FREE exchanges:It is important to understand that any cryptocurrency exchange, regardless of whether it requires KYC, is subject to certain risks. Governments can shut down an exchange or impose restrictions on it.In the case of the Philippines:Yes, it is true that the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of the Philippines has banned Binance and other cryptocurrency exchanges that do not require KYC.However, it is important to note that this does not mean that all KYC-FREE exchanges are illegal in the Philippines.There are exchanges that are registered in other jurisdictions and are not subject to Philippine laws.Yes, we do have a P2P exchange on our platform.

comments.author: EXMON
comments.body: Mahalagang Anunsyo: Paglipat ng EXMON Coin Listing sa Nobyembre 1Mahal na mga User,Sa EXMON, palagi naming inuuna ang kalidad at pagiging maaasahan, kaya't napagpasyahan naming ilipat ang petsa ng listing ng aming coin mula Setyembre 1 patungong Nobyembre 1. Alam naming marami sa inyo ang sabik na naghihintay para sa kaganapang ito, at nais naming tiyakin sa inyo na ginawa ang desisyong ito nang isinasaalang-alang ang inyong pinakamahusay na interes.Bakit ang Pagbabago?Sa mga nakaraang buwan, masugid na sinubok ng EXMON team ang aming produkto at nagtipon ng mahahalagang feedback mula sa aming mga kasosyo. Sa prosesong ito, natuklasan namin ang mga lugar kung saan maaari naming magawa ang makabuluhang mga pagpapabuti upang mapalakas ang halaga ng aming coin para sa inyo.Ano ang Matatapos Namin sa Nobyembre?Sa panahong ito, tututukan namin ang pagpapahusay ng seguridad, pag-optimize ng performance, at pagsasama sa mga bagong platform. Kumpiyansa kami na ang mga pagpapabuti na ito ay gagawin ang EXMON coin na mas kaakit-akit para sa lahat ng kalahok sa merkado.Nauunawaan namin na maaaring maging mahirap ang paghihintay, ngunit sigurado kami na magiging sulit ang resulta. Salamat sa inyong pasensya at patuloy na suporta. Abangan ang higit pang mga update—maraming kapana-panabik na bagay ang paparating!Lubos na gumagalang, Ang EXMON Team
